ExternalProject_Add(bpftool
    PREFIX ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bpftool
    SOURCE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bpftool/src
    CONFIGURE_COMMAND ""
    BUILD_COMMAND make bootstrap OUTPUT=${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}
    BUILD_IN_SOURCE TRUE
    INSTALL_COMMAND ""
    STEP_TARGETS build
)

set(BPFOBJECT_BPFTOOL_EXE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bootstrap/bpftool)
